title: Restricted admin support | mRemoteNG v1.76.20.24615
author: Xrypto0
body_snippet:
Restricted admin support | mRemoteNG v1.76.20.24615

Hi all,

we would like to know if mRemoteNG is supporting the restricted admin mode within the latest stable version v1.76.20.24615?

Could not find any information regarding this within the changelog. Thanks in advance!

@sparerd @kmscode @Kvarkas @farosch

comments.snippet: See #1125. This Feature should come with Build 1.77.3
comments.author: simonai1254

comments.snippet:
Seems like it was added in 1.77.3
Check #2203
comments.author: LIyoai

comments.snippet:
Triage refresh (P4 version-label debt): this issue is tagged with legacy version labels. Please retest on the latest build (fork v1.79.x or upstream dev), then share reproducible steps and expected vs actual behavior. If still valid, keep open and relabel to current triage scope (for example Need 2 check). If fixed, close with resolution.

Current legacy version labels: 1.77.3
comments.author: robertpopa22
